**Code Analyzer** ğŸ›¡ï¸ is an open-source command-line tool designed to help developers and security professionals analyze code repositories for vulnerabilities ğŸ› and bugs. By leveraging the power of AI ğŸ¤– through the DeepSeek API, it provides detailed insights and recommendations to improve code quality and security.

## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### Prerequisites

- ğŸ Python 3.6 or higher
- ğŸ”‘ A DeepSeek API key (obtainable from [DeepSeek](https://www.deepseek.com/))

### Install from PyPI

```bash
pip install code-analyzer
```

### Set Up API Key

```bash
code_analyzer setup
```
The key will be saved in `~/.code_analyzer/config.ini` ğŸ”’

## ğŸ•µï¸ Usage

### Analyzing a GitHub Repository ğŸŒ

Public repo:
```bash
code_analyzer analyze https://github.com/user/repo
```

Private repo ğŸ”:
```bash
code_analyzer analyze https://github.com/user/private-repo --git-token YOUR_TOKEN
```

### Analyzing a Local Directory ğŸ“‚

```bash
code_analyzer analyze /path/to/local/repo
```

Current directory ğŸ”„:
```bash
code_analyzer analyze .
```

### âš™ï¸ Command-Line Options

- `-o, --output FILE` ğŸ’¾: Save report (`.txt`, `.md`, `.html`, `.json`, `.sarif`)
- `-f, --format FORMAT` ğŸ¨: Output format
- `--verbose` ğŸ“¢: Debugging output
- `--no-details` ğŸš«: Minimal report
- `--lang LANG` ğŸŒ: Language support
- `--no-stream` ğŸ¤: Silent mode

Example ğŸ§ª:
```bash
code_analyzer analyze . --output report.sarif --format sarif --no-stream --lang uz
```

---

## âš¡ CI/CD Integration

### Example GitHub Actions Workflow ğŸ¤–

```yaml
name: Code Analysis

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  analyze:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code 
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Set up Python 
      uses: actions/setup-python@v5
    
    - name: Install code-analyzer 
      run: pip install code-analyzer-b
    
    - name: Configure API key 
      env:
        DEEPSEEK_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.DEEPSEEK_API_KEY }}
      run: mkdir -p ~/.code_analyzer && echo "[DEEPSEEK]\nAPI_KEY = $DEEPSEEK_API_KEY" > ~/.code_analyzer/config.ini
    
    - name: Run analysis 
      run: code_analyzer analyze . --output report.sarif --format sarif --no-stream --lang en
    
    - name: Upload SARIF 
      uses: github/codeql-action/upload-sarif@v3
```
